_comment: This JSON file contains parameters for the O2 experiment (Glucose/Phosphate Starvation). Modify values as needed.

database._comment: Database connection queries for retrieving passaging and media data. Update these queries if your data source changes.

queries.passaging_query: SELECT id, cellLine, event, passaged_from_id1, passage, date, correctedCount, cellCount, areaOccupied_um2, cellSize_um2, media FROM Passaging

filters._comment: Define filter ranges for seeding lineages. 'first' and 'last' denote the starting and ending seed IDs. 'label' and 'label2' are used to group data.

plotting._comment: Plotting configuration. Update the options below to change colors, titles, axis labels, and faceting behavior. Also set the output path for saving the plot.

titles._comment: Set plot titles for different conditions. These titles are used on your plots.

axis_labels._comment: Axis labels for the plots. Adjust these values to change the x-axis and y-axis labels.

facet_grid._comment: Faceting options for splitting the plots. 'rows' and 'cols' define the layout and 'scales' controls the axis scaling.

database_settings._comment: Database settings. Set disconnect_on_completion to true to automatically disconnect after the script finishes.
